description: Provides a pre-signed URL for download of a completed attachment. This is an asynchronous API for use with active contacts. For security recommendations, see Amazon Connect Chat security best practices. The Amazon Connect Participant Service APIs do not use Signature Version 4 authentication.

parameters.name: AttachmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the attachment.

parameters.name: ConnectionToken
parameters.description: The authentication token associated with the participant's connection.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: This is the pre-signed URL that can be used for uploading the file to Amazon S3 when used in response to StartAttachmentUpload.

nested_items.name: UrlExpiry
nested_items.description: The expiration time of the URL in ISO timestamp. It's specified in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2019-11-08T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: AttachmentSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the attachment in bytes.
